Title: Unfinished Business
Writer: Nicki Paluga, Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Arielle Carver-O'Neill
Plot: Brock warns Ash of an otherworldly hurricane brewing; Ash and Brock make a discovery at the hardware store; Kelly and Brandy face a familiar foe.
